Name: Running on Empty
About the game: Running on Empty is a minimal yet deep post-apocalyptic role-playing game with resource management mechanics (in 64x64 retro pixel graphics!) Your sole mission is to retrieve the package from the place far away. Go through the cruel world. Run between settlements, help residents, deal with raiders to complete the mission. Features Managing your resources to survive in the wasteland Multiple ways to finish the story Leveling up your skills with skill points Randomly generated maps 3 Factions to support or oppose Steam achievements Gunfights, sniping enemies, picking locks, hacking terminals... It is highly recommended to read the game manual before playing.
